mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PRODUCT_IMAGE (IMAGE_ID, PRODUCT_NO, IS_THUMBNAIL, IMAGE_URL) VALUES (PRODUCT_IMAGE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{productNo}, #{isThumbnail}, #{imageUrl})
mapper.select: SELECT O.* FROM PRODUCT P INNER JOIN PRODUCT_OPTION O ON P.PRODUCT_NO = O.PRODUCT_NO WHERE P.PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}

SELECT I.IMAGE_ID AS imageId, I.PRODUCT_NO AS productNo, UPPER(TRIM(I.IS_THUMBNAIL)) AS isThumbnail, -- 공백/대소문자 정규화 NVL(I.SORT_ORDER, 9999) AS sortOrder, DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(I.IMAGE_URL, 4000, 1) AS imageUrl FROM PRODUCT_IMAGE I WHERE I.PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo} AND UPPER(TRIM(I.IS_THUMBNAIL)) IN ('A','N') -- 유효한 값만 ORDER BY DECODE(UPPER(TRIM(I.IS_THUMBNAIL)), 'A', 1, 'N', 2, 9), -- A 먼저 NVL(I.SORT_ORDER, 9999), I.IMAGE_ID

SELECT P.PRODUCT_NO, P.PNAME, P.PINFO, P.PRICE, I.IMAGE_URL FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_IMAGE I ON P.PRODUCT_NO = I.PRODUCT_NO AND I.IS_THUMBNAIL = 'Y' WHERE P.RECOMMEND = 'Y' ORDER BY P.PRODUCT_NO DESC

SELECT P.PRODUCT_NO, P.PNAME, P.PRICE, I.IMAGE_URL FROM PRODUCT P LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_IMAGE I ON P.PRODUCT_NO = I.PRODUCT_NO AND I.IS_THUMBNAIL = 'Y' WHERE P.PRODUCT_STATUS = 'SELLING' ORDER BY P.CDATETIME DESC

SELECT P.PRODUCT_NO AS productNo, P.SELLER_ID AS sellerId, -- 이미 user_id와 동일 의미 P.CATEGORY_NO AS categoryNo, P.PNAME AS pName, P.PINFO AS pInfo, P.PRICE AS price, P.ORIGIN AS origin, P.PRODUCT_STATUS AS productStatus, TO_CHAR(P.CDATETIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS cdate, NVL(IMG.IMAGE_URL, '/resources/img/category/noimage.jpg') AS filePath,
-- USERS, SELLER_INFO, REVIEW 정보 U.NAME AS userName, SI.BUSINESS_NAME AS businessName,
REGEXP_REPLACE( REGEXP_SUBSTR(U.ADDRESS, '^[^ ]+ [^ ]+'), '(특별시|광역시|도)', '' ) AS region,
NVL(ROUND(R.RATING, 1), 0) AS rating
FROM PRODUCT P
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT PRODUCT_NO, IMAGE_URL FROM ( SELECT PRODUCT_NO, IMAGE_URL, ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY PRODUCT_NO ORDER BY NVL(SORT_ORDER, 9999), IMAGE_ID ) AS RN FROM PRODUCT_IMAGE WHERE UPPER(TRIM(IS_THUMBNAIL)) = 'Y' ) WHERE RN = 1 ) IMG ON P.PRODUCT_NO = IMG.PRODUCT_NO
LEFT JOIN USERS U ON P.SELLER_ID = U.USER_ID LEFT JOIN SELLER_INFO SI ON U.USER_ID = SI.USER_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT PRODUCT_NO, AVG(RATING) AS RATING FROM REVIEW GROUP BY PRODUCT_NO ) R ON P.PRODUCT_NO = R.PRODUCT_NO
ORDER BY P.PRODUCT_NO

SELECT C.CATEGORY_NO AS categoryNo, C.CATEGORY_NAME AS categoryName, C.PARENT_CATEGORY_NO AS parentCategoryNo, NVL(I.IMAGE_URL, '/resources/img/category/noimage.png') AS imageUrl FROM PRODUCT_CATEGORY C LEFT JOIN CATEGORY_IMAGE I ON C.CATEGORY_NO = I.CATEGORY_NO ORDER BY C.CATEGORY_NO

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT REGEXP_REPLACE( REGEXP_SUBSTR(U.ADDRESS, '^[^ ]+ [^ ]+'), '(특별시|광역시|도)', '' ) AS region, COUNT(P.PRODUCT_NO) AS productCount FROM PRODUCT P JOIN SELLER_INFO SI ON P.SELLER_ID = SI.USER_ID JOIN USERS U ON SI.USER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE U.USER_ROLE = 'SELLER' GROUP BY REGEXP_REPLACE( REGEXP_SUBSTR(U.ADDRESS, '^[^ ]+ [^ ]+'), '(특별시|광역시|도)', '' ) ORDER BY region ) OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{pageSize} ROWS ONLY

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT REGEXP_REPLACE( REGEXP_SUBSTR(U.ADDRESS, '^[^ ]+ [^ ]+'), '(특별시|광역시|도)', '' ) AS region FROM PRODUCT P JOIN SELLER_INFO SI ON P.SELLER_ID = SI.USER_ID JOIN USERS U ON SI.USER_ID = U.USER_ID WHERE U.USER_ROLE = 'SELLER' GROUP BY REGEXP_REPLACE( REGEXP_SUBSTR(U.ADDRESS, '^[^ ]+ [^ ]+'), '(특별시|광역시|도)', '' ) )

SELECT Q.TITLE, Q.USER_ID, Q.STATUS, TO_CHAR(Q.CDATETIME, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DATE, A.CONTENT AS ANSWER, Q.IS_SECRET, P.SELLER_ID FROM PRODUCT_QNA Q JOIN PRODUCT P ON Q.PRODUCT_NO = P.PRODUCT_NO LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_QNA_ANSWER A ON Q.QNA_NO = A.QNA_NO WHERE Q.PRODUCT_NO = #{productNo}
